attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Improve legislation to force companies esepcially those in the private sector to grant paid leave (within reason ie xx number of hours per annum) for those who have elderly parents who live alone. So many of us cannot afford to give up work and physically cannot afford to spend all our paid leave to aid parents who live unassisted but who still need some help in emergencies or start to deteriorate.
